column4: I'm looking for a mail software that can receive the mails from my several freemail accountsvia pop3, send mails via my isp's smtp server and provide a web interface on my local server to access these mails.
most can do thos, minus the webmail part.
What are 'most'? I need something to download the mails and i need a imap server. Then i could use any webmail client.
you could setup a pop client to download all your mail, then an imap server (cyrus, maybe) + webmail (roundcube)
